text: 'ISR assets confirm target at 35°15'N, 45°30'E,' said the JTAC. 'CAS is cleared hot,' added the AWACS. Pilots, remember: key your radios with the codeword 'Raven.' ECM will jam at 1700 Zulu; adjust ingress timing to meet TOT at 1725.
prompt: The audio file may contain the following terminology, listed here for your convenience: ALR, RPA, RWR, ECM, IADS, AO, FLOT, GPS, FL, RTB, Zulu, ISR, PID, BDA, ATO, CAS, TOT, JTAC, IFF, TACAN, RPA, ID, CAS, ATO, FLOT, OBJ, AWACS
